title: Available for Aug - 1BR Apartment walking Distance to Harvard Square
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour:', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at (617) 272-7141 to book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Or visit our website at: <URL>', 'Crimson Court is a contemporary building in quiet residential setting but is less than a five-minute walk to Harvard Square, Red Line and University shuttle buses.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully-equipped and updated kitchens with hardwood flooring in select units.', 'Our community features controlled access with elevators, as well as onsite laundry facilities.', 'Beautifully landscaped grounds with a quiet yard equipped with grill station surround the building, and invite you into an outdoor dining area.', 'Details:', 'Availability date: September 2, 2022', 'Pets: None allowed', 'Deposit: 1-month $2,600', 'Application fee: None', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost: Heat/hot water', 'Laundry:', 'On-site coin-op', 'Parking type: Off-street reserved available $150/month', 'Offered by:', 'Crimson Court']
